Text:
Wow!

Great stuff!

This will do well on my iPod this weekend!

Thank you very much!!!!!

I have been going through several thousand DVDs of stuff I've saved over the last 6 years, I will be posting collections of many different historical figures.... like Churchill, Washington, Thatcher, Reagan probably 15 documentaries, audiobooks and archives just on those 4.

Over the next week or two I will post some "different" collections, like Ayn Rand. I'm not an Objectivist, but I find her interesting... maybe even fascinating. Depending on the decade I thing she is crazy or a genius. Sometimes both.

I have a few surprises coming. In a good surprise way.
